details.arabic_diacless: رب هب لى حكما والحقنى بالصٰلحينۙ‏
details.arabic: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِىۡ حُكۡمًا وَّاَلۡحِقۡنِىۡ بِالصّٰلِحِيۡنَۙ‏
details.transliteration: Rabbi hab lee hukman wa alhiqnee bis saliheen.
details.translations: My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.

details.arabic_diacless: واجعل لى لسان صدق فى الاٰخرينۙ‏
details.arabic: وَاجۡعَلْ لِّىۡ لِسَانَ صِدۡقٍ فِى الۡاٰخِرِيۡنَۙ‏
details.transliteration: Waj'al lee lisana sidqin fil akhireen.
details.translations: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.

details.transliteration: Waj'al nee min warathati jannatin na'eem.
details.translations: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.

details.arabic_diacless: واغفر لابي انهٗ كان من الضآلينۙ
details.arabic: وَاغۡفِرۡ لِاَبِيْٓ اِنَّهٗ كَانَ مِنَ الضَّآلِّيۡنَۙ
details.translations: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.
And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -

details.arabic_diacless: يوم لا ينفع مال ولا بنونۙ‏
details.arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنۡفَعُ مَالٌ وَّلَا بَنُوۡنَۙ‏
details.transliteration: Yawma la yanfa'u malun walaa banoon.
details.translations: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children

details.arabic_diacless: الا من اتى اللٰه بقلب سليمؕ‏
details.arabic: اِلَّا مَنۡ اَتَى اللّٰهَ بِقَلۡبٍ سَلِيۡمٍؕ‏
details.transliteration: Illa man ata Allah bi qalbin saleem.
details.translations: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart.
